metadata.title: CVE-2021-3404 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In ytnef 1.9.3, the SwapWord function in lib/ytnef.c allows remoteattackers to cause a denial-of-service (and potentially code execution) dueto a heap buffer overflow which can be triggered via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libytnef: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
